mainBoard.flavorText: Heavy enough to withstand the Roil, leatherback skeletons are havens for travelers in storms and landshifts.

foreignData.flavorText: Suficientemente pesados como para soportar la Turbulencia, los esqueletos de lomos de cuero son refugios para viajeros durante las tormentas.

foreignData.flavorText: Assez denses pour résister au Roulis, les squelettes des luths sont une aubaine pour les voyageurs pris dans les tempêtes et les glissements de terre.

foreignData.flavorText: Robusti a sufficienza per resistere al Torbido, gli scheletri dei dorsi di cuoio sono una manna dal cielo per tutti i viaggiatori che si trovano nel mezzo di una tempesta o di un terremoto.
foreignData.name: Baloth Dorso di Cuoio

foreignData.flavorText: 乱動に耐えるだけの重さを持つ皮背の骨は、嵐や地すべりのときの旅人の避難場所になる。

foreignData.flavorText: Suficientemente robustos para resistir ao Turbilhão, os esqueletos dos dorso-de-couro servem de refúgio aos viajantes durante tempestades e transformações de terreno.

foreignData.flavorText: Достаточно тяжелые для того, чтобы выстоять Великий Вал, скелеты кожистых балотов служат путешественникам надежным пристанищем во время штормов и землетрясений.

mainBoard.name: Garruk's Packleader
mainBoard.originalText: Whenever another creature with power 3 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.

rulings.text: If Garruk's Packleader and another creature with power 3 or greater enter under your control at the same time, the ability will trigger.

The ability checks the power of each creature as it enters. It will take into account counters the permanent enters with and static abilities that affect its power (such as Flinthoof Boar's ability). After the creature is on the battlefield, raising its power with a spell (such as Titanic Growth), an activated ability, or a triggered ability won't cause this ability to retroactively trigger.
The creature's power is checked only to see if the ability triggers. It doesn't matter what the creature's power is when the ability resolves.

mainBoard.text: Whenever another creature you control with power 3 or greater enters, you may draw a card.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"The desire for its magic horn inspires such bloodthirsty greed that all who see the unicorn will kill to possess it."
—Dionus, elvish archdruid

foreignData.flavorText:
„Das Verlangen nach seinem magischen Horn wird oft zu einer so blutrünstigen Gier, dass alle, die das Einhorn sehen, es deswegen zu töten versuchen."
—Dionus, Elfischer Erzdruide
foreignData.name: Preziöses Einhorn
foreignData.text: Alle Kreaturen, die das Preziöse Einhorn blocken können, tun dies.

foreignData.flavorText:
"El deseo por su cuerno mágico inspira una avaricia tan sangrienta que todos los que ven al unicornio matarán para poseerlo."
—Dionus, archidruida élfico
foreignData.name: Unicornio preciado
foreignData.text: Todas las criaturas que puedan bloquear al Unicornio preciado lo hacen.

foreignData.flavorText:
« Le désir de posséder sa corne magique inspire une telle envie meurtrière que quiconque voit la licorne va tuer pour la posséder. »
—Dionus, archidruide elfe
foreignData.name: Licorne prisée
foreignData.text: Toutes les créatures capables de bloquer la Licorne prisée le font.

foreignData.flavorText:
"Il desiderio per il suo corno magico ispira una tale cupidigia assetata di sangue che tutti quelli che vedono l'unicorno uccideranno per averlo."
—Dionus, arcidruido elfico
foreignData.name: Unicorno Stimato
foreignData.text: Tutte le creature in grado di bloccare l'Unicorno Stimato lo fanno.

foreignData.flavorText:
「その魔法の角に対する欲望は、かくも血なまぐさい強欲さを呼び起こし、ついにはその一角獣を見た者は、それを手に入れるために殺そうとするに至る。」
――エルフの大ドルイド、ダイオヌス
foreignData.name: 尊き一角獣
foreignData.text: 尊き一角獣をブロックできるすべてのクリーチャーは、それをブロックする。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ユニコーン

foreignData.flavorText:
"O desejo por seu chifre mágico inspira uma avidez tão violenta que todos que o veem matariam para tê-lo."
— Dionus, elfo arqueodruida
foreignData.name: Unicórnio Cobiçado
foreignData.text: Todas as criaturas aptas a bloquear Unicórnio Cobiçado o fazem.

foreignData.flavorText:
«Стремление обладать его волшебным рогом вселяет такую кровожадную алчность, что все, кто видят единорога, готовы убивать, лишь бы заполучить его».
— Дионус, эльфийский архидруид
foreignData.name: Ценный Единорог
foreignData.text: Все существа, способные блокировать Ценного Единорога, блокируют его.

foreignData.flavorText:
「其神奇犄角引发的占有欲能导致浓烈的嗜血贪欲，让所有见到这独角兽的人都要杀掉他好独占犄角。」
～妖精高位德鲁伊戴欧诺
foreignData.name: 珍奇独角兽
foreignData.text: 所有能够阻挡珍奇独角兽的生物皆须阻挡之。

foreignData.flavorText:
「其神奇犄角引發的佔有慾能導致濃烈的嗜血貪欲，讓所有見到這獨角獸的人都要殺掉牠好獨占犄角。」
～妖精高位德魯伊戴歐諾
foreignData.name: 珍奇獨角獸
foreignData.text: 所有能夠阻擋珍奇獨角獸的生物皆須阻擋之。

mainBoard.name: Prized Unicorn
mainBoard.originalText: All creatures able to block Prized Unicorn do so.

rulings.text: If a creature the defending player controls can’t block Prized Unicorn for any reason (such as being tapped), then it doesn’t block Prized Unicorn. If there’s a cost associated with having a creature block Prized Unicorn, the defending player isn’t forced to pay that cost, so it doesn’t have to block.
If more than one Prized Unicorn is attacking, creatures that could block must block one Prized Unicorn, but they don’t all have to block the same Prized Unicorn.

mainBoard.text: All creatures able to block Prized Unicorn do so.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"I raised my bow, and the wolf stared at me. Under its gaze, my finger would not release the string."
—Aref the Hunter

foreignData.flavorText:
„Ich spannte meinen Bogen, und der Wolf starrte mich an. Sein Blick fesselte mich, und ich konnte die Sehne nicht loslassen."
—Aref der Jäger
foreignData.name: Heiliger Wolf
foreignData.text: Der Heilige Wolf kann nicht das Ziel von Zaubersprüchen oder Fähigkeiten sein, die deine Gegner kontrollieren.

foreignData.flavorText:

foreignData.flavorText:

foreignData.name: 聖狼

mainBoard.name: Sacred Wolf
mainBoard.originalText: Sacred Wolf can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.
mainBoard.text: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

mainBoard.flavorText: Like all jungle plants, the vines must fight and claw for sunlight. Once their place is secured, they grow strong, sharp, and impenetrable.

foreignData.flavorText: Wie alle Dschungelpflanzen müssen auch die Ranken mit allen Mitteln um Sonnenlicht kämpfen. Sobald sie sich ihren Platz gesichert haben, verflechten sie sich zu einem starken, dornigen und undurchdringbaren Gewebe.
foreignData.name: Rankenmauer
foreignData.text:
Verteidiger (Diese Kreatur kann nicht angreifen.)
Reichweite (Diese Kreatur kann fliegende Kreaturen blocken.)

foreignData.flavorText: Al igual que todas las plantas de la selva, las enredaderas deben luchar por un poco de luz. Una vez que su lugar está asegurado, crecen fuertes, afiladas e impenetrables.
foreignData.name: Muro de enredaderas
foreignData.text:
Defensor. (Esta criatura no puede atacar.)
Alcance. (Esta criatura puede bloquear criaturas con la habilidad de volar.)

foreignData.flavorText: Comme les autres plantes de la jungle, les lianes doivent se battre pour profiter de la lumière du soleil. Une fois leur place sécurisée, elles deviennent plus fortes, plus acérées et impénétrables.
foreignData.name: Mur de vignes
foreignData.text:
Défenseur (Cette créature ne peut pas attaquer.)
Portée (Cette créature peut bloquer les créatures avec le vol.)

foreignData.flavorText: Come tutte le piante della giungla, le liane devono aprirsi un varco con gli artigli per la luce del sole. Dopo essersi assicurate un posto, crescono forti, affilate e impenetrabili.

mainBoard.name: Explore
mainBoard.originalText:
You may play an additional land this turn.
Draw a card.

rulings.text: Explore's effect allows you to play an additional land during your main phase. Doing so follows the normal timing rules for playing lands. In particular, you don't get to play a land as Explore resolves; Explore fully resolves first and you draw a card, perhaps a land you'll play later.
If you somehow manage to cast Explore when it's not your turn, you'll draw a card when it resolves, but you won't be able to play a land that turn.
The effects of multiple Explores in the same turn are cumulative. They're also cumulative with other effects that let you play additional lands, such as the one from Urban Evolution.

mainBoard.name: Feral Contest
mainBoard.originalText: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Another target creature blocks it this turn if able.

rulings.text: Casting Feral Contest doesn’t force you to attack with the first targeted creature that turn. If that creature doesn’t attack, the second targeted creature is free to block whichever creature its controller chooses, or block no creatures at all.

If just the first targeted creature is an illegal target by the time Feral Contest resolves, it won’t get a +1/+1 counter. However, the second targeted creature is still affected by the blocking restriction the spell imposes, so it’ll have to block the first targeted creature that turn if able.

If just the second targeted creature is an illegal target by the time Feral Contest resolves, the first targeted creature will get a +1/+1 counter, but the second targeted creature won’t have to block it that turn.

If you attack with the first targeted creature but the second targeted creature isn’t able to block it (for example, because the first targeted creature has flying and the second one doesn’t), the requirement to block does nothing. The second targeted creature is free to block whichever creature its controller chooses, or block no creatures at all.

Tapped creatures, creatures that can’t block as the result of an effect, creatures with unpaid costs to block (such as those from War Cadence), and creatures that aren’t controlled by the defending player are exempt from effects that would require them to block. Such creatures can be targeted by Feral Contest, but the requirement to block does nothing.

You must choose two targets as you cast Feral Contest: a creature you control and any other creature. If you can’t (because there’s only one creature on the battlefield, perhaps), then you can’t cast the spell. Note that the second target may also be a creature you control.

mainBoard.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Another target creature blocks it this turn if able.

mainBoard.name: Canopy Cover
mainBoard.originalText:
Enchant creature

rulings.text: This is not the same as hexproof. If, for example, you target one of your opponent’s creatures, your opponents won’t be able to target their own creature with spells or abilities.
